mapper.select: select t1.spectrum_id,t1.precursor_m_z,t1.`ms_level`,t1.`identified`,t1.`charge`, t1.`sum_of_intensity`,t1.`peaks`,t1.precursor_Intensity,t3.`subid`,t3.`subtitle` from t_spectrum t1 left join t_pep_pro_psm_sub t2 on (t1.`spectrum_id`=t2.`spectrum_id`) left join `t_subproject` t3 on (t2.`subid`=t3.`subid`) where t3.subid=#{subId} limit #{rows},20;
select count(*) from t_spectrum t1 left join t_pep_pro_psm_sub t2 on (t1.`spectrum_id`=t2.`spectrum_id`) left join `t_subproject` t3 on (t2.`subid`=t3.`subid`) where t3.subid=#{subId};

select distinct t1.path from `t_spectrum` t1 left join `t_pep_pro_psm_sub` t2 ON (t1.`spectrum_id`=t2.`spectrum_id`) left join `t_peptide` t3 ON (t2.`peptide_id`=t3.`peptide_id`) where t3.`peptide_id`=#{peptide_id};
SELECT t2.peaks FROM (SELECT DISTINCT spectrum_id,subid FROM t_pep_pro_psm_sub)t1 LEFT JOIN t_spectrum t2 ON (t1.spectrum_id=t2.spectrum_id) WHERE t1.subid=#{subid} ORDER BY t2.peaks DESC

SELECT t2.charge,COUNT(*) as number FROM (SELECT DISTINCT spectrum_id,subid FROM t_pep_pro_psm_sub)t1 LEFT JOIN t_spectrum t2 ON(t1.spectrum_id=t2.spectrum_id) WHERE t1.subid=#{subid} AND t2.identified=1 GROUP BY t2.charge
